modName: Forest-Peak House - A simple customizable player home
summary: This mod adds a simple player home called Forest-Peak house to Skyrim. It is located west of Helgen and can be accessed early in the game. Contains all the features an aspiring Dragonborn could want, all arranged in a convenient manner for easy access.
descriptionHtml:
[color=greenyellow]Update to version 1.4[/color] - Added MCM support. Almost every part of the house is now customizable through the MCM in SkyUI. Added outside archery range.
[color=greenyellow]Update to version 1.3[/color] - Final release for the foreseeable future. Greatly improved indoor navmesh, to allow followers to navigate better. Added new mushroom patch and torch sconce to Forest-Peak mines.
[color=greenyellow]Update to version 1.2[/color] - Tanning rack moved from first floor to outdoors. Added player owned storage safe to first floor. Added woodcutter\'s axe to chopping block. Added menu to allow the user to customize the house to suit them (menu can be accessed by reading the owner\'s note on the table). Slightly improved navmesh to make it easier for followers to navigate house and mines (not yet complete).
[color=greenyellow]Update to version 1.1[/color] - added two new player chests, a removable torch sconce and some more lights down in the basement.

This mod adds a simple player home called Forest-Peak house to Skyrim. It is located west of Helgen and can be accessed early in the game. Please see the attached screen-shots for further information. 

Contains all the features an aspiring Dragonborn could want:

1x Alchemy workbench
1x Bed
5x Bookshelf
1x Cooking pot
9x Divine shrines
1x Enchanting workbench
1x Forge
1x Grindstone
13x Guardian stones
3x Player storage chest
1x Safe
1x Smelter
1x Smithing workbench
1x Tanning rack
4x Weapon display plaques
12x Weapon racks

All arranged in a convenient manner for easy access. I\\\'ve tried to make this as lore-friendly as possible, although exactly how the guardian stones were shipped here and miniaturised will require some suspension of disbelief on the part of the user.

[youtube]6Au4vvxs9TU[/youtube]

[youtube]8qhfiOl3N6U[/youtube]

[youtube]Hkg1PEIfsa0[/youtube]

[youtube]gpK3THKPQxc[/youtube]

[youtube]Uf6Pmr8NYCc[/youtube]

This mod has no dependencies and is fully compatible with the vanilla game, requires no DLC.

This mod should be compatible with almost everything, if you would like me to test compatibility with anything in particular please advise.

To install this mod, download the .rar and use the nexus mod manager. Or you can drop the .esp file into your Data directory if you dont use the mod manager.

Created by mackam08 aka IrksomeBadger.

=============
RELEASE NOTES
=============

========================
v1.4.0
========================

Date of release: 23/03/2013
Purpose: Content patch
Notes: Added MCM support. Almost every part of the house is now customizable through the MCM in SkyUI. Added outside archery range.
Released by: mackam08 aka IrksomeBadger

CHANGED CELLS
=============

_poh
_pohmines
_pohLoc (Wilderness 0,-19)
_pohLoc2 (Wilderness 1, -19)

========================
v1.3.0
========================

Date of release: 15/03/2013
Purpose: Content patch
Notes: Greatly improved indoor navmesh, to allow followers to navigate better. Added new mushroom patch and torch sconce to Forest-Peak mines.
Released by: mackam08 aka IrksomeBadger

CHANGED CELLS
=============

_poh
_pohmines

========================
v1.2.0
========================

Date of release: 13/03/2013
Purpose: Content patch
Notes: Tanning rack moved from first floor to outdoors. Added player owned storage safe to first floor. Added woodcutter\'s axe to chopping block. Added menu to allow the user to customize the house to suit them. Slightly improved navmesh to make it easier for followers to navigate house and mines (not yet complete).
Released by: mackam08 aka IrksomeBadger

CHANGED CELLS
=============

_poh
_pohmines
_pohLoc2 (Wilderness 1, -19)

========================

========================
v1.1.0
========================

Date of release: 12/03/2013
Purpose: Content patch
Notes: Added two new player storage chests. Added a removable torch sconce to the mines. Added more lights to the mines to improve user visibility.
Released by: mackam08 aka IrksomeBadger

CHANGED CELLS
=============

_pohmines

========================

========================
v1.0.0
========================

Date of release: 11/03/2013
Purpose: Initial release
Notes: This is the first public release version, it adds the \\\"Forest-Peak House\\\" and \\\"Forest-Peak Mines\\\" areas for the player to use 
as a home.
Released by: mackam08 aka IrksomeBadger

NEW CELLS
=========

_poh
_pohmines

CHANGED CELLS
=============

_pohLoc (Wilderness 0,-19)
_pohLoc2 (Wilderness 1, -19)
